name: bab
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ as form of address ] UK Midlands English informal used as a friendly way of talking to someone: How are you doing, bab? When I started work at 16 the older women called me bab.
More examplesFewer examplesOther words are a tad less decipherable, including bab – "a local term of affection".When I asked the question, the majority came back with their favourite local word being Bab.Alright, bab?Babby is a local variation of baby, and the shortened form bab is often used as an affectionate term for "love" or "dear".
